review: My son has Amazon Fire TV. So one evening my wife and I went to his home to see what it was all about. We were amazed! The clarity, sound and performance we great. The system is incredibly  easy to install and operate. After about an hour, we were convinced that Amazon Fire TV was the way we wanted to go. We purchased ours that night. After years of paying for cable TV with it's constantly rising premiums and poor choices, we were finally able to get rid of the $174 dollar a month cable bill & Sign up for shows "WE" wanted to watch. All for about $47 dollars a month plus the cost of internet! Our family is very happy with our Amazon Fire TV!!!!
